document.full_text: a 21-year-old chinese man who attended a proposed pro-democracy "jasmine revolution" protest in beijing was sentenced to labor re-education, in the first confirmed punishment for the middle east-inspired gatherings that were squashed by wary authorities.
document.title: china sends man to labor camp over "jasmine" rally
lines_and_colors: a 21-year-old chinese man who attended a proposed pro-democracy "jasmine revolution" protest in beijing was sentenced to labor re-education, in the first confirmed punishment for the middle east-inspired gatherings that were squashed by wary authorities.
